sentences.en: A small, circular or crescent - shaped opening in a vaulted roof.
sentences.cn: 半圆壁,''.'弧形'. ''窗在高高的屋顶上的小的, 圆的或新月形的开口.

sentences.en: As soon as he came to the ditch, he vaulted over.
sentences.cn: 当他一走到这个沟附近, 他就跃了过去.

sentences.en: For that reason, many new homes now have big, open kitchens and vaulted ceilings.
sentences.cn: 因为这个原因，现在许多新房子都有大而开放的厨房以及拱形的屋顶。

sentences.en: He put his hand on the gate and vaulted it easily.
sentences.cn: 他用手支撑着大门,很容易就跳过去了.

sentences.en: He put his hands on the gate and vaulted it easily.
sentences.cn: 他把手放到门上并很轻松地跳过去.

sentences.en: He ran along the veranda, vaulted the end.
sentences.cn: 他沿着阳台奔去, 双手一撑跳过了尽头.

sentences.en: He ran to the door and vaulted into the saddle.
sentences.cn: 他跑到门口，飞身跃上马背。

sentences.en: He took a jump at the wall and vaulted over.
In the arched space beneath, there's a vaulted wine cellar.
sentences.cn: 在拱形的地下空间里, 有个圆顶的酒窖.

sentences.en: John took a running jump at the fence and vaulted over ( it ).
sentences.cn: 约翰加上助跑,用手一撑,飞身跃过篱笆.

sentences.en: Ned vaulted over a fallen tree.
sentences.cn: 内德跳过一棵倒下的树。

sentences.en: She vaulted over the gate and ran up the path.
sentences.cn: 她用手一撑跃过栅栏门沿着小路跑去。

sentences.en: The boy vaulted the fence and ran into the woods.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩跳过篱笆,然后跑进树林.

sentences.en: The criminal vaulted over the wall and ran off.
The formal living room has a fireplace and vaulted ceilings.
sentences.cn: 正式的客厅有一个壁炉和拱形天花板。

sentences.en: The jockey vaulted into the sandle.
The water surface in the cup is slightly vaulted upward.
sentences.cn: 一杯水的上部应该是凹面的.

words.tran_cn: 给…盖以拱顶；作成穹形；跳跃（vault的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: in the shape of or consisting of several arches joined together
